downloadDescription: Help files related to on-box BizTalk Server 2013 R2 Help
detailsSection: Help files related to on-box BizTalk Server 2013 R2 Help. Replace these files on the computer that has BizTalk Server 2013 R2 installed. Copy these files over to \Program Files\BizTalk Server 2013 R2\Documentation.
systemRequirementsSection:
• For CHM and HTM files: No special software needed.
  • For HxS files: Required software is shipped with BizTalk Server.
installInstructionSection:
1. To start the download, click the Download button next to the desired file.
  2. Do one of the following:
    • To start the installation immediately, click Open.
    • To copy the download to your computer for installation at a later time, click Save.
    • To cancel the installation, click Cancel.
    • After you have downloaded the Help files, copy the contents of the download to the \Documentation folder where BizTalk Server is installed.
